item.title: DC-4 of the DC Series
item.author: revsh3ll
item.description: If you’re wanting to learn SQLi and kernel exploitation, I’d suggest loading up DC-3. It showcased the importance of keeping your systems, internal and external, updated(patched). In the real world, keeping systems up-to-date can help deter attacks, by increasing the time and effort needed by the adversary, but can be difficult to implement.
